entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending late this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 40 gusting to 60 this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight. Wind north 30 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Friday 24 March 2023
